name: <Demography contribution fields>
description: Fields coming from demography contribution study (available only when it is active), see demography_contribution.csv.

name: approval_author_domain
description: Domain of the developer approving the patchset.

name: approval_author_name
description: Name of developer approving the patchset.

name: approval_description
description: Description of the approval.

name: approval_granted_on
description: Date when the changeset was approved.

name: approval_type
description: Type of the approval.

name: approval_value
description: Value of the approval.

name: author_bot
description: True if the given patchset comment author is identified as a bot, equals to reviewer_bot.

name: author_domain
description: Domain associated to the patchset comment author in SortingHat profile, equals to reviewer_domain.

name: author_gender
description: Patchset comment author gender, equals to reviewer_gender.

name: author_gender_acc
description: Accuracy of the patchset comment author gender, equals to reviewer_gender_acc.

name: author_id
description: Patchset comment author Id from SortingHat, equals to reviewer_id.

name: author_name
description: Patchset comment author name, equals to reviewer_name.

name: author_org_name
description: Organization the patchset comment author belongs to, equals to reviewer_org_name.

name: author_user_name
description: Patchset comment author user name, equals reviewer_user_name.

name: author_uuid
description: Patchset comment author unique identifier from SortingHat, equals reviewer_user_name.

name: branch
description: Development branch created for this changeset.

name: by_bot
description: True if the given changeset approver is identified as a bot.

name: by_domain
description: Domain associated to the changeset approver in SortingHat profile.

name: by_gender
description: Changeset approver gender.

name: by_gender_acc
description: Accuracy of the changeset approver gender.

name: by_id
description: Changeset approver Id from SortingHat.

name: by_name
description: Changeset approver name.

name: by_org_name
description: Organization the changeset approver belongs to.

name: by_user_name
description: Changeset approver user name.

name: by_uuid
description: Changeset approver unique identifier from SortingHat.

name: changeset_author_bot
description: True if the given changeset author is identified as a bot, equal to owner_bot.

name: changeset_author_domain
description: Domain associated to the changeset author in SortingHat profile, equal to owner_domain.

name: changeset_author_gender
description: Changeset author gender, equal to owner_gender.

name: changeset_author_gender_acc
description: Accuracy of the changeset author gender, equal to owner_gender_acc.

name: changeset_author_id
description: Changeset author Id from SortingHat, equal to owner_id.

name: changeset_author_name
description: Changeset author name, equal to owner_name.

name: changeset_author_org_name
description: Organization the changeset author belongs to, equal to owner_org_name.

name: changeset_author_user_name
description: Changeset author user name, equal to owner_user_name.

name: changeset_author_uuid
description: Changeset author unique identifier from SortingHat, equal to owner_uuid.

name: changeset_number
description: Gerrit changeset unique identifier.

name: changeset_status
description: Changeset status such as Abandoned, Merged or Open. The actual value depends on the instance of Gerrit.

name: changeset_status_value
description: Value of the last code-review approval made by someone else than the author for a given changeset, it can be -2 -1 1 or 2.

name: closed
description: Closing date of the changeset.

name: comment_created_on
description: Creation date of the changeset comment.

name: comment_message
description: Message of the patchset comment

name: created_on
description: Creation date of the changeset.

name: domain
description: Domain of changeset owner.

name: githash
description: Hash of the commit included in the changeset.

name: grimoire_creation_date
description: Commit creation date.

name: id
description: Id of the item

name: is_gerrit_approval
description: Field containing '1' only if the item is a patchset approval.

name: is_gerrit_changeset
description: Field containing '1' only if the item is a patchset changeset.

name: is_gerrit_comment
description: Field containing '1' only if the item is a patchset comment.

name: is_gerrit_patchset
description: Field containing '1' only if the item is a patchset.

name: is_gerrit_review
description: Field containing '1' that allows to sum fields when concatenating with other indexes.

name: last_updated
description: Date when the changeset was last updated.

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the item was enriched.

name: metadata__gelk_backend_name
description: Grimoire-ELK backend name.

name: metadata__gelk_version
description: Grimoire-ELK version.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Date when the item was stored in RAW index.

name: metadata__updated_on
description: Date when the item was updated in its original data-source.

name: name
description: Changeset owner name.

name: open
description: True if Changeset status is open

name: opened
description: Changeset sent date.

name: origin
description: Original URL where the changeset was retrieved.

name: owner_bot
description: True if the given changeset owner is identified as a bot.

name: owner_domain
description: Domain associated to the changeset owner in SortingHat profile.

name: owner_gender
description: Changeset owner gender.

name: owner_gender_acc
description: Accuracy of the changeset owner gender.

name: owner_id
description: Changeset owner Id from SortingHat.

name: owner_name
description: Changeset owner name.

name: owner_org_name
description: Organization the changeset owner belongs to.

name: owner_user_name
description: Changeset owner user name.

name: owner_uuid
description: Changeset owner unique identifier from SortingHat.

name: patchset_author_domain
description: Domain of the developer authoring the patchset.

name: patchset_author_name
description: Name of developer authoring the patchset.

name: patchset_created_on
description: Date when the patchset was created.

name: patchset_isDraft
description: True if the patchset is a draft.

name: patchset_kind
description: Patchset type.

name: patchset_number
description: Patchset number.

name: patchset_ref
description: Patchset reference.

name: patchset_revision
description: Patchset revision.

name: patchset_sizeDeletions
description: Size of the patchset deletion.

name: patchset_sizeInsertions
description: Size of the patchset insertions.

name: patchset_time_to_first_review
description: Time to first review of the patchset in days.

name: patchset_uploader_domain
description: Domain of the developer sending the patchset.

name: patchset_uploader_name
description: Name of developer sending the patchset.

name: patchsets
description: Number of patchsets/iterations involved in the changeset.

name: project
description: First level project hierarchy.

name: project_1
description: Second level project hierarchy (typically not used in Gerrit).

name: repository
description: Repository (project in Gerrit terminology) where the changeset is sent.

name: repository_labels
description: Custom repository labels defined by the user.

name: reviewer_bot
description: True if the given patchset reviewer is identified as a bot.

name: reviewer_domain
description: Domain associated to the patchset reviewer in SortingHat profile.

name: reviewer_gender
description: Patchset reviewer gender.

name: reviewer_gender_acc
description: Accuracy of the patchset reviewer gender.

name: reviewer_id
description: Patchset reviewer Id from SortingHat.

name: reviewer_name
description: Patchset reviewer name.

name: reviewer_org_name
description: Organization the patchset reviewer belongs to.

name: reviewer_user_name
description: Patchset reviewer user name.

name: reviewer_uuid
description: Patchset reviewer unique identifier from SortingHat.

name: status
description: Changeset status such as Abandoned, Merged or Open. The actual value depends on the instance of Gerrit.

name: status_value
description: Value of the last code-review approval made by someone else than the author for a given changeset, it can be -2 -1 1 or 2.

name: summary
description: Text summary added by the developer. This is typically the commit message.

name: summary_analyzed
description: Text summary added by the developer. This is typically the commit message. This field is tokenized for searching purposes.

name: tag
description: Perceval tag.

name: timeopen
description: Time that the changeset has been opened in days.

name: time_to_first_review
description: Time to first review of the changeset in days.

name: type
description: Type of the enriched items, it can be: changeset, comment, patchset and approval.

name: uploader_bot
description: True if the given patchset uploader is identified as a bot.

name: uploader_domain
description: Domain associated to the patchset uploader in SortingHat profile.

name: uploader_gender
description: Patchset uploader gender.

name: uploader_gender_acc
description: Accuracy of the patchset uploader gender.

name: uploader_id
description: Patchset uploader Id from SortingHat.

name: uploader_name
description: Patchset uploader name.

name: uploader_org_name
description: Organization the patchset uploader belongs to.

name: uploader_user_name
description: Patchset uploader user name.

name: uploader_uuid
description: Patchset uploader unique identifier from SortingHat.

name: url
description: Full URL pointing to the changeset.

name: uuid
description: Perceval UUID

name: wip
description: True if Changeset is marked as Work In Progress
